import { useDispatch, useSelector } from "react-redux"; import paypal from "../../assests/images/paypal.png"; import checkout from "../../assests/images/checkout.png"; //price summary product function PriceSummary(props: any) { //maintain state on refresh const total = window.localStorage.getItem('total'); const totolPrice = total ? JSON.parse(total) : []; // return component return (
); } export default PriceSummary;
